PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: Output matrice. Image to store the edges found by the function.

DESCRIPTION.P: canny The function Canny finds the edges on the input image "ima_in" and puts them into the output image "ima_out" using the Canny algorithm.
